titles.title: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 1 Dollar Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to redesign the $1 coin to commemorate Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Introduced. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., 1 Dollar Coin Act - Requires the obverse and reverse sides, respectively, of the one dollar coin to have the likeness of, and a design emblematic of, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
